attributes.action: Order councils to repair holes in the roads. OR abolish road tax!
attributes.additional_details: We dont need evidence just take a drive around the streets. Dont go around Chelsea, kingsington, Hadley Wood, Downing street ect go to suburbs and normal streets.
attributes.background: The roads are becoming dangerous for all users and repair costs to vehicles out of control. We driver's pay premiums in road tax and home owners Council tax and feel the payments are not being used properly. Either do the repairs or Abolish road tax.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government has increased roads funding for councils, including for fixing potholes. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-allocates-12-billion-roads-funding-to-councils

If you'd like the Government to take further action, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
